source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_00<tab>Baderon has a task for a trusted adventurer.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_00<tab>バデロンは信頼を置いている冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_01<tab>According to Baderon, the missive intended for Ahtzapfyn is written in Sahagin script, and details plans for the destruction of the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>. Though the message mentions a diversionary strike on Swiftperch, the Wench's proprietor seems convinced that the Serpent Reavers are lying, and that the struggling settlement is their true target. Take Baderon's hastily translated note and deliver it to Commodore Reyner at the Coral Tower.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_01<tab>バデロンが解読した書簡は、ヴィクトリー号爆破に関する指示書だった。バデロンの読みでは「海蛇の舌」の本当の狙いは、西ラノシアにあるスウィフトパーチ入植地の襲撃にあるという。コーラルタワーの「レイナー」に「バデロンの走り書き」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_02<tab>Though Reyner is grateful for Baderon's warning, he believes Swiftperch is but one of several settlements which the Serpent Raiders could be planning to attack. While the commodore debates where to deploy his forces, a Yellowjacket arrives bearing word that South Tidegate is being assaulted by the Sahagin. Lacking the resources to defend both locations, Reyner instructs you to make haste to Swiftperch and speak with the Yellowjacket, Ryssfloh.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_02<tab>バデロンの推測を裏付けるかのように、レイナーのもとにサハギン族が南北防波壁を襲撃したとの報せが入った。「スウィフトパーチ入植地」に急ぎ「リスフロー」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_03<tab>With the help of the Yellowjackets, you defeat the marauding Serpent Reavers and spare the residents of Swiftperch a fate worse than death.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_03<tab>「海蛇の舌」からスウィフトパーチ入植地を無事、守ることができた。どうやらサハギン族と「海蛇の舌」は、仮面の魔道士に扇動されていたようだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_04<tab>According to Y'shtola, the Sahagin and their pirate allies were being manipulated by a masked mage she calls an “Ascian.” Though much remains shrouded in mystery, not least the strange black crystal you discovered near the mage's remains, the truth behind the kidnappings has finally come to light. Return to the Coral Tower and report to Commodore Reyner.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_04<tab>異邦・シャーレアンの民だというヤ・シュトラ、倒れた魔道士が落としたと思われる黒い水晶……。不思議な点は多いが、ともあれ事件は解決を見たようだ。コーラルタワーにいる「レイナー」へ報告しに行こう。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_05<tab>Your meeting with Commodore Reyner is interrupted by the appearance of Admiral Merlwyb, who commends you for your brave deeds. In recognition of your services to Limsa Lominsa, she insists that you attend a forthcoming banquet as her honored guest. Proud and daunted in equal measure, you look forward to what promises to be a memorable occasion.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_SEQ_05<tab>数々の働きでリムサ・ロミンサに貢献した冒険者へ、メルウィブ提督は深く感謝しているようだ。その証として、メルウィブ提督は冒険者を晩餐会へ招待してくれた。リムサ・ロミンサのため、これからも最善を尽くしていこう。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Baderon's note to Reyner.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_00<tab>レイナーにバデロンの走り書きを渡す

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_01<tab>Travel to Swiftperch and speak with Ryssfloh.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_01<tab>スウィフトパーチ入植地のリスフローと話す

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_02<tab>Report to Reyner at the Coral Tower.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_02<tab>コーラルタワーのレイナーと話す

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_03<tab>Report to Reyner at the Coral Tower.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_TODO_03<tab>コーラルタワーのレイナーと話す

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_050_1<tab>Good to 'ave ye aboard, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Now then...where to start?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_050_1<tab>よかった、引き受けてくれるんだな。
実はな……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_1<tab>Back when I was younger an' nastier, I earned me livin' as a sellsword. In that business, if ye wanted to know what yer enemy was up to, you 'ad to learn to read the orders ye prised from the cold dead 'ands of 'is mates. That's 'ow I came to know 'ow to read yer message.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_1<tab>俺は昔、流しの傭兵をやってたことがあってな……。
敵の動きを知るために、奪った書類を解読して、
情報を得ていたもんさ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_2<tab>Truth be told, the script was only too bloody familiar. Them's <var 1A 02 /var>Sahagin<var 1A 01 /var> letters, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. An' I should know─I've gutted more fishback messengers than I can count.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_2<tab>書類に書かれている文字……。
こいつは俺が、かつて何度も刃を交えた敵、
蛮族「サハギン族」の文字だ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_3<tab>It gets worse, though... The plan to blow up the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> is all in 'ere, right down to the fine details.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_3<tab>問題は、その内容だ。
……この書類には、ヴィクトリー号爆破の時間や、
作戦内容が指定されている。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_4<tab>Looks like they meant to raise eight kinds of 'ell in western La Noscea, then 'it the Maelstrom's new flagship in the confusion.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_4<tab>「西ラノシア」で騒ぎを起こす。
その間、指定した時間にヴィクトリー号を
爆破するように……とな。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_5<tab>The point bein', the attack on the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> weren't the act of a few rebellious pirates─'twas a key part o' some canny bastard's grand plan.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_5<tab>つまり、先の「ヴィクトリー号爆破未遂事件」は、
何者かに指示されていたってことだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_6<tab>But if I'm readin' this aright, the attack itself came much too early. I'll wager they panicked when they saw ye was on to 'em, rushed in to do the job, an' buggered it up.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_6<tab>しかし、指定された時間より、随分前に事は起こっている。
おまえさんたちが調査し始めて、焦ったんだろうな……。
案の定、作戦は失敗し、未遂に終わった。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_7<tab>Hmmm... Them tattoo-faced bastards as they say was payin' Ahtbyrm's old man, they're with the Serpent Reavers, right? ...But none o' their crew was there, was they? Did they 'ave summat better to do, or what?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_7<tab>アートビルムの父親に資金を提供していたという、
蒼き刺青の男たち……。
……もしや「海蛇の舌」の奴らか。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_8<tab>...Seven 'ells! I've got it all backwards! That mess at the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>─<var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> was meant to be the bloody distraction!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_8<tab>そうか……わかったぜ！
これは、奴らの作戦の一端だ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_9<tab>The fishbacks ain't interested in the Maelstrom's baby! They're after <var 1A 02 /var>men<var 1A 01 /var>, just like they've always been. They're sendin' their pirate lackeys after a civilian target.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_9<tab>サハギン族のことだ、裏で何か企んでいるに違いない。
……指定されていた時間に、「海蛇の舌」の奴らを使って、
別の場所を襲わせるつもりだったんだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_10<tab>This bit about raisin' 'ell in western La Noscea...that's where it'll be. Summat tells me Swiftperch is about to get 'it, an' 'it 'ard!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_10<tab>「西ラノシア」での騒ぎ……。
読めたぞ……本命は「スウィフトパーチ入植地」だ！
急がないとヤバイぜ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_11<tab>'Ere's a rough translation o' the message.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_11<tab>サハギン文字を翻訳したメモを用意した。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_12<tab>Take it to Commodore Reyner at the Coral Tower, an' tell 'im 'e's in fer a busy day.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_12<tab>これを、コーラルタワーにいる、
イエロージャケットのレイナー司令に渡して、
状況を伝えてくれないか。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_13<tab>Oh, an' give 'im an 'and, eh? Ye can be damn sure 'e'll need one.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BADERON_000_13<tab>そして、おまえさんの力を貸してほしい。
下手すりゃ、リムサ・ロミンサの未来に関わることだ。
……よろしく頼んだぜ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_20<tab>Yes, I am Reyner. Ah, you must be the adventurer whose name seems to be on everyone's lips.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_20<tab>君が噂の冒険者か。
私が、イエロージャケットの司令、
レイナー・ハンスレッドだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_21<tab>You are to be commended for your part in thwarting the plot to destroy the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>. Now, what can I do for you this day?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_21<tab>ヴィクトリー号爆破未遂事件は聞いている。
よくやってくれたな！
……して、今日は何の用かな？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_22<tab>You bear an urgent message from Baderon? Why do I get the feeling that my hopes for a quiet <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((afternoon)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> are about to be cruelly dashed? Tell me, what is afoot?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_22<tab>バデロンからの急ぎの連絡だと？
……ふむ、穏やかではないな。
いったい、どんな用件なのだ？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_30<tab>An assault on Swiftperch!? But we've seen nothing to suggest the Serpent Reavers are massing for an attack.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_30<tab>なんだと！？
「海蛇の舌」が「スウィフトパーチ入植地」を襲うだと？
これは本当なのか？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_31<tab>Even so, it would be foolish to discount the possibility─Baderon is rarely wrong about such matters.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_31<tab>なんということだ……。
バデロンの推測に間違いはないだろう。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_32<tab>I will marshal the Yellowjackets for battle immediately.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_32<tab>リムサ・ロミンサの警備を担う
イエロージャケットとして、放っておけぬ事態だ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_33<tab>The only question is where to send them. While I concur with Baderon's assessment that the attack on the Drydocks was intended as a diversion, Swiftperch is but one of several possible targets for the main thrust.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_33<tab>しかし「スウィフトパーチ入植地」が本命とは限らん。
サハギン族を抑えている南北防波壁の可能性も十分に……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKET_000_34<tab>Commodore, sir!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKET_000_34<tab>レイナー隊長！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_35<tab>Report.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_35<tab>何事だ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKET_000_36<tab>It's the Sahagin, sir! They've mounted a large-scale assault on South Tidegate, and threaten to overwhelm our defenses within the day. The garrison requests immediate reinforcements.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKET_000_36<tab>た、大変です！
南北防波壁にて、サハギン族が攻勢に出た模様！
イエロージャケットにも支援要請が届いています！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_37<tab>By the Navigator... It seems my decision has been made for me.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_37<tab>ここに来てサハギン族だと？
ええい、何が起きているというのだ……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_38<tab>Muster the troops and give the order to march.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_38<tab>こんな時、「光の戦士たち」が居てくれれば。
……いかんいかん。
さっそくイエロージャケット本隊を現地へ……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_39<tab>Aye, the Serpent Reavers are in league with the Sahagin.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_39<tab>そうか……。
「海蛇の舌」は、サハギン族と手を結んだ海賊だ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_40<tab>...Which means there is every chance this assault on Tidegate may yet prove to be another feint. The fact remains, however, that we can ill afford to ignore it. And that leaves Swiftperch vulnerable to those pirate traitors.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_40<tab>となると、南北防波壁を襲ったサハギン族も陽動……？
やはり、本命は「スウィフトパーチ入植地」なのか！？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_41<tab>It is at times such as these that I wish the Warriors of Light yet walked among us. But wishes will avail us naught. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> must serve in their absence. Make for Swiftperch with all haste and lend your strength to the squads I can spare for the settlement's defense.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_41<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>よ……。
君の力を貸してほしい。
「スウィフトパーチ入植地」に急ぎ、ともに戦ってくれ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_45<tab>Commodore Reyner sent word we'd be getting reinforcements, but I didn't expect him to send you! You certainly look like you've seen your share of action, though─you bear little resemblance to the wide-eyed whelp I met fresh off the ferry.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_45<tab>レイナー隊長からの伝令で
増援が来るとは聞いていたが、まさか君だとは！
すっかりたくましくなって！　見ちがえたよ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_46<tab>In any case, do you know what you're fighting for here? This place─Swiftperch─it was rebuilt by folk who stood strong in the face of every hardship the Calamity threw their way.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_46<tab>この場所……スウィフトパーチは、
リムサ・ロミンサの民が第七霊災による被害や
度重なる困難にもめげずに、復興させた集落なんだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_47<tab>And we're not about to let some fish-fancying scum claim the honor of being the ones who finally broke their spirits. Don't give those pirate bastards one bloody ilm, you hear me?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_47<tab>そう、我々の役目は民の不屈の精神を守ること！
この戦い、けっして負けられないぞ！
君も肝に銘じておいてくれ！

source:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_Q1_000_1<tab>Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Feint and Strike”?
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_Q1_000_1<tab>クエスト「スウィフトパーチで蠢く闇」のバトルを開始しますか？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_A1_000_1<tab>はい

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_A1_000_2<tab>No
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_A1_000_2<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_GLAZRAEL_000_50<tab>Here they come!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_GLAZRAEL_000_50<tab>来たぞ、海賊だ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_DECKMAN_000_51<tab>'Ere now, I thought all them Yellowjacket worms was meant to be busy. That useless scrag ain't followed the plan, 'as 'e?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_DECKMAN_000_51<tab>チッ、なぜイエロージャケットどもが居るんだ！？
さては、あの野郎しくじりやがったな……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_HELMSMAN_000_52<tab>Now what? Pull back and wait for our Sahagin brothers?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_HELMSMAN_000_52<tab>どうする？
一旦引いて、サハギン族の増援を待つか？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_53<tab>Piss on that! We ain't turnin' back empty-handed!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_53<tab>へっ、構うことはねぇ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_54<tab>Remember, no killin' the smallfolk, or it'll be <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> blood what stains Lord Leviathan's altars!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_54<tab>いいか、住民は殺すんじゃねぇぞ！
こいつらは、リヴァイアサン様に捧げる、
大事な土産だからな！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_55<tab>The Yellowbellies ye can butcher at will! Them dirt-eatin' slugs'll be crushed under the full might o' the Serpent Reavers!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_55<tab>……その代わり、イエロージャケットどもは皆殺しだ！
お前ら！
「海蛇の舌」の実力を見せてやれ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_56<tab>Seems Swiftperch was the main target after all, eh?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_56<tab>「海蛇の舌」め……。
こちらが本命だったな。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_57<tab>Squads One and Two, protect the townsfolk! Squad Three, you're our rear guard!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_57<tab>第一班、第二班は、住民を護れ！
第三班は後方支援！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_58<tab>The rest of you─we meet their charge where we stand! Let us bear the commodore word of our victory, or no word at all!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_58<tab>第四班以下は、奴らをここで食い止める！
レイナー隊長に吉報を持って帰るぞ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKETS_000_58<tab>(-Yellowjacket Infantry-)For Limsa Lominsa!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKETS_000_58<tab>(-イエロージャケット陸戦兵たち-)オー！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_59<tab>Rargh! I'll gut all you Yellowbellies an' dance on yer gizzards!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_BAENRYSS_000_59<tab>ヒーハー！！
全員まとめてぶち殺してやるぜ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_70<tab>Well fought─the Reavers are beaten and scattered.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_70<tab>大方片付いたようだな。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_71<tab>I'll take some men and hunt down the stragglers. Oh, but there may be more of them lurking about, so don't let your guard down just yet.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_71<tab>我々は、周辺に潜んでいる残党を狩りにいく。
この辺りにも、まだ潜んでいるかもしれん。
気を付けてな。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_72<tab>The source of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> strength becomes clear...
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_72<tab>なるほど、それが力の理由か……。
どうりで石人形ごときではかなわぬはずだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_73<tab>You may have bested the golem, but you will not fare so well this day.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_73<tab>しかし……！
これはどうかな？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_74<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>O mournful voice of creation! Send unto me a creature of the abyss, my thrall to command, that I may smite mine enemies!<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_74<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>示せ、創世の理の嘆き声よ。
空虚に有りし夾雑の御霊を呼び出さん……。
出よ、深淵の悍魂よ！<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_75<tab>Your very being imperils the plan. You cannot be suffered to live.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_75<tab>貴様は危険な存在だ。
ここで芽を摘んでおくとしよう。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_80<tab>Unnngh... That the wisdom of the Paragons should be brought low...by mere mortals...
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_MASKEDMAGUS_000_80<tab>我ら「天使い」の……秘術が……。
……打ち破られるとは……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_81<tab>“Paragons,” did he say? Then it is as I feared.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_81<tab>天使い（あまつかい）ですって？
……そうだったのね。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_82<tab>They are known as the Bringers of Chaos...or <var 1A 02 /var>Ascians<var 1A 01 /var>, to give them their proper name.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_82<tab>混乱の創造主「天使い」。
いえ、伝承に沿って「アシエン」と呼ぶべきか……。
実在していただなんて。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_83<tab>It would seem our suspicions were correct─it is they who have been manipulating the beast tribes.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_83<tab>蛮族の陰にアシエン有り、という情報は本当だったのね。

source:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_84<tab>Pardon? You would know if we Sharlayans have encountered Ascians before?
...I have never spoken to you of my homeland. How did you know whence I hail?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_84<tab>それが、シャーレアンから来た目的か……ですって？
なぜ、私が異邦の……。
シャーレアンの民だと解ったのかしら？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_85<tab>Wait. I do begin to see. You have been blessed with a special gift.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_85<tab>……いえ、いいわ。
あなた、やはり「あの力」を持っているようね。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_86<tab>Are you all right, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!? If I'd known a mean bugger like that was hiding in the bushes, I would've left a squad or six to keep you company.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_86<tab>大丈夫か！？
まさか、こんな奴まで潜んでいたとは……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_87<tab>Well, at least now we can call this kidnapping investigation to a close. Those Reavers were the ones spiriting folk away in the dead of night, and this bastard here was pulling all the strings.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_87<tab>例の「人拐い」は「海蛇の舌」で間違いないだろう。
そして、こいつが黒幕だったってわけか。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_88<tab>A trifle simplistic, but not inaccurate.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_88<tab>そんなところね。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_89<tab>I came as soon as I sensed his presence, but I never thought to find such a scene of carnage. Yet we prevailed. And thanks to your heroic actions, I have learned much.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_89<tab>嫌な気配を感じて来てみれば、
こんなことになっていたなんて。
……でも、お陰で収穫があったわ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_90<tab>Aye, “heroic” is the word. I don't want to think about what would've happened if you hadn't been here, friend.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_90<tab>助かったぞ、冒険者！
感謝する！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_91<tab>And your assistance is much appreciated, too, Lady Y'shtola. Please give our regards to the Scions.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_RYSSFLOH_000_91<tab>ご協力、感謝いたします、ヤ・シュトラ殿。
「暁」の皆さまにも、よろしくお伝えください。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_92<tab>I am glad to have played a role in bringing what I hope is an end to this disturbing spate of abductions.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_92<tab>これでリムサ・ロミンサを騒がせていた
人拐い騒動も一段落かしら。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_93<tab>The thread of your fate forms a part of a most intriguing tapestry. Mayhap we will be afforded the chance to speak more in the near future.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_93<tab>あなたは、奇妙な運命に巻き込まれたようね。
詳しいことは、いずれ話すことになるでしょう。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_94<tab>For now, however, you must see this particular tale to its conclusion. Pray send my greetings to Commodore Reyner.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YSHTOLA_000_94<tab>今はまず、この事件の後始末が先。
レイナー隊長に、よろしく伝えておいてね。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_GLAZRAEL_000_97<tab>Feint after bloody feint! Those pirates are getting too damn clever by half!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_GLAZRAEL_000_97<tab>まさか、陽動作戦とは！
いまいましい、海賊どもめ……！！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKETA_000_98<tab>You've come to aid with the defense? Then well met, and well come!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKETA_000_98<tab>防衛に協力してくれるのですか！？
ありがとうございます、心強いです！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKETB_000_99<tab>Come on, you gutless bastards! Let's see how you fare against trained soldiers!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKETB_000_99<tab>来るなら来い！
この地は、絶対に守りきってみせる！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, eagerly have I awaited your return!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_100<tab>帰ってきたか、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>！
無事で何よりだ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_101<tab>Word of your exploits is already spreading through the ranks. My troops and I owe you a great debt of gratitude for your timely assistance.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_101<tab>君の活躍は伝令からも聞いている。
イエロージャケットへの協力、心から礼を言うぞ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_102<tab>You have shown yourself to be possessed of a sure arm, a strong spirit, and sound judgment. Would that Limsa Lominsa had more of your like.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_102<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>。
君は、実に良い腕、良い根性、良い目をしている。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_103<tab>I have little doubt that you shall one day join the ranks of Eorzea's greatest adventurers. It is but a matter of time.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_103<tab>いつかきっと名立たる冒険者になるだろう。
イエロージャケットの隊長……
レイナーが認めたのだ、間違いない。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_104<tab>Clearly, Baderon's eye for potential remains as sharp as ever, though I doubt even <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> imagined you capable of such feats.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_104<tab>バデロンの目に狂いは無かったということだ。
メルウィブ提督も、さぞやお喜びになるだろう！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_105<tab>Might you favor me with your own account of the day's events? Such victories bear retelling!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_105<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>、
君という冒険者に、個人的な興味がわいてきたぞ。
こちらで、武勇伝など聞かせてもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_110<tab>Y'shtola has been working with us for quite some time, you see.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_110<tab>実は、ヤ・シュトラ君とは、
以前から協力関係にあってね。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_111<tab>And she was only too willing to assist the Yellowjackets in the kidnapping investigation, proving herself a stalwart ally of Limsa Lominsa yet again.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_111<tab>今回の件も、イエロージャケットとともに
彼女に動いてもらっていたんだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_112<tab>Needless to say, after your part in thwarting the attempted sabotage of the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>, and the small matter of your deeds at Swiftperch, you too have proven yourself a valued friend of the thalassocracy.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_112<tab>しかし、ヴィクトリー号爆破未遂事件といい、
今回の件といい、君には本当に世話になりっぱなしだな。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKET_000_113<tab>Admiral!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_YELLOWJACKET_000_113<tab>提督！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_204<tab>May I present to you Admiral Bloefhiswyn.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_REYNER_000_204<tab>リムサ・ロミンサの首長、メルウィブ提督だ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400010_MERLWYB<tab>So this is the adventurer I've been reading about in the field reports.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400010_MERLWYB<tab>君が噂の冒険者か。
なるほど、いい面構えをしている。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400020_MERLWYB<tab>You seem familiar. Have we met? Mayhap at a medal presentation or some such?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400020_MERLWYB<tab>君は……？
なんだ、この頭の中がうずく感じは……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400030_MERLWYB<tab>No? Have you kin in the Maelstrom?
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400030_MERLWYB<tab>ダメだ。
まるで霞がかかったように……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400040_MERLWYB<tab>I'll be sworn I─ But it is of little matter. To business.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400040_MERLWYB<tab>でも何故だ。
お互い、初めて会うはずなのに、
こんなに懐かしさを感じるとは……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400050_MERLWYB<tab>I am Merlwyb Bloefhiswyn, Admiral of Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400050_MERLWYB<tab>私は、メルウィブ・ブルーフィスウィンだ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400060_MERLWYB<tab>On behalf of my people, I bid you thanks for the deeds you have done this day.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400060_MERLWYB<tab>本日は、数々の働きの礼を言いにきた。
海の都リムサ・ロミンサを代表し、感謝する。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400070_MERLWYB<tab>A token of our gratitude. What worth is high regard without just reward, after all? Ha!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400070_MERLWYB<tab>これを、受け取ってくれたまえ。
リムサ・ロミンサへ力を貸してくれている、
せめてもの礼だ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400080_MERLWYB<tab>Since you first set foot in our city, my good friend Baderon and Commodore Reyner have taken turns at regaling me with tales of your exploits.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400080_MERLWYB<tab>バデロンやレイナーから聞いていたよ。
我が国へ、すばらしい冒険者が訪れたのだとな。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400090_MERLWYB<tab>Safe to say, they left an impression. Join me at the coming banquet.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400090_MERLWYB<tab>君を、ぜひ晩餐会に招待したい。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400100_MERLWYB<tab>A seat of honor at the celebratory feast is the least I can offer the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who foiled the Sahagin.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400100_MERLWYB<tab>サハギン族の暗躍を、
大事になる前に防いでくれたのだ。
これくらいの礼は受け取ってもらわんとな。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400110_YELLOWJACKET<tab>Oho!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400110_YELLOWJACKET<tab>なんと！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400120_YELLOWJACKET<tab>A seat at the feast!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400120_YELLOWJACKET<tab>じきじきの招待とは！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400130_MERLWYB<tab>Oh, and don't be late.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400130_MERLWYB<tab>では、待っているぞ。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400140_MERLWYB<tab>Your fellow guests will be eager to take the measure of their newest hero, and some do not take kindly to being kept waiting. Till then, may you walk in the light of the Crystal.
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_400140_MERLWYB<tab>それから……。
これからも我々に力を貸してくれたまえ。
君に、クリスタルの導きがあらんことを。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat the Serpent Reavers.
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_TODO001<tab>海賊団「海蛇の舌」を倒せ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_01<tab>Leave no pirate scum standing! Show 'em how a Yellowjacket fights!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_01<tab>「海蛇の舌」をせん滅せよ！
イエロージャケットの力を見せてやれ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_GLAZRAEL_01<tab>Bwahaha! Time to split some heads, adventurer! Let's start with the frontline fodder!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_GLAZRAEL_01<tab>おお！　やってやるぞ！
冒険者よ、雑魚から片付けるぞ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_REACT_TO_VOID<tab>Is that a bloody <var 1A 02 /var>voidsent<var 1A 01 /var>!? Hold steady, lads!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_REACT_TO_VOID<tab>依代も無しに妖異を召喚しただと！？
持ちこたえろ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_02<tab>More of the bastards!? Come on, then!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_02<tab>増援だと！？　押されているのか！？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_BOSS_01<tab>All right, ye scurvy bastards... Here's a trick to make ye soil yer breeches!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_BOSS_01<tab>ええい、小賢しい奴らめ……！
こうなったら、天使いの秘術を使う！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_BOSS_02<tab>Dweller o' the Abyss, yer master calls! Heed me words an' smite me foes!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_BOSS_02<tab>出よ、深淵に棲みし異形の者よ！
我の言葉に従い、奴らを蹴散らせ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_DEAD<tab>Damn...
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_RYSSFLOH_DEAD<tab>すまん、こんなところで……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_GLAZRAEL_DEAD<tab>Least I went down fighting...
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_GLAZRAEL_DEAD<tab>レ、レイナー隊長ォォ……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YELLOWJACKETARMYA_DEAD<tab>So cold...
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YELLOWJACKETARMYA_DEAD<tab>油断したか……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YELLOWJACKETARMYB_DEAD<tab>I'm done for...
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YELLOWJACKETARMYB_DEAD<tab>ここまでか……。

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_GLAZRAEL_BOSS_HP25_REACT<tab>Keep on pummeling him! He can't take much more of this!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_GLAZRAEL_BOSS_HP25_REACT<tab>もう少しだ！　総員、気合を入れろ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_TODO002<tab>Defeat the masked mage!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_TODO002<tab>仮面の魔道士たちを倒せ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_START<tab>Soon, you shall take your vile gifts to the grave!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_START<tab>死ぬがいい……穢れた力を持つものよ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_POISON<tab>Mwahahaha! Writhe as the venom eats its way through your veins!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_POISON<tab>ハハハッ！　その猛毒で、もがき苦しむがいい！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_01<tab>An unwelcome guest. No matter, all shall fall before me!
target:
TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_01<tab>チッ……邪魔が入ったか……。
構わん、まとめて葬ってやる！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_HP60<tab>Whence springs this preternatural might!?
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_HP60<tab>ここまでの力とは……！？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YSHTOLA_ENTER<tab>A fearsome opponent...against whom you shall not stand alone!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YSHTOLA_ENTER<tab>間に合ったわね！　手伝うわ！

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_HP40<tab>No mortal should possess such strength!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_HP40<tab>貴様の力は一体！？

source: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YSHTOLA_MASKEDMAGUS_HP20<tab>His power wanes! Afford him no chance to recover!
target: TEXT_MANSEA007_00544_QIB_YSHTOLA_MASKEDMAGUS_HP20<tab>いけるわ！　よし、一気に叩くわよ！
